transcript_chunks.text: I got to to play of about two hours two separate demos one story based that was a flashback where you get to play as cloud and sephiroth which was very very very cool and then an open world bit uh that's just outside of junon which is one of the bigger locations from the original game a little bit of the open world leading into that uh section of the game I enjoyed the hell out of this and I can't wait for this game I'm not worried or concerned about this game whatsoever I I think that I'm going to be in the minority on this uh compared to a lot of the other previews that might be out there I just think that the demo itself wasn't really great at showing what's gonna make this game better than remake okay in the way that Spider-Man 2 I clearly know what makes it better than Miles Morales and spider gotcha another thing against it for me was how fresh off of Final Fantasy 16 I am mainly affected me in terms of maneuverability on the battlefield of wanting to close the gap between me and

spider gotcha another thing against it for me was how fresh off of Final Fantasy 16 I am mainly affected me in terms of maneuverability on the battlefield of wanting to close the gap between me and an enemy I thought that demo was okay
